## Days 3-5

\[ September 18 & 25 + October 2, 2024 \]

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Big Picture Overview

Work through a sample case from reading in the data to producing a report.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

#### In-class Example

Thanks you Karen Munoz for providing a de-identified data!

To get started, you will need the following files save in the SAME folder:

\(1\) the DATA, in SPS format: [SPSS dataset (.sav)](https://usu.box.com/s/zvvkaa236dxofyqta44gmffn4ds0a0bt)

\(2\) the empty skeleton/outline NOTEBOOK: [Supplement Skeleton (.Rmd)](https://usu.box.com/s/vzrxpqxuio4kmpf90g874zbn0p9bv9bb)

\(3\) the STYLE file: [APA 7th edition (.csl)](https://usu.box.com/s/cgqgctyely96y157ohx12a6ah757ncgc)

At the end of day 5, this is the file we ended with: [End of day 5](https://usu.box.com/s/235so3ok6ntc8uqkfvzzgrr2qpngn51z)
